bill.title: Relating to the Psychiatric Security Review Board.
bill.description: Directs Psychiatric Security Review Board to study progress in developing restorative justice program, and to provide results of study to interim committees of Legislative Assembly no later than December 31, 2024. Directs Psychiatric Security Review Board to study progress in developing restorative justice program, and to provide results of study to interim committees of Legislative Assembly no later than December 31, 2024. Sunsets January 2, 2025.

history.action: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
Referred to Judiciary with subsequent referral to Behavioral Health and Health Care.
